text: Ernst-Georg Schwill (30 March 1939 - 9 April 2020) was a German actor, best known for his performance as Kohle in the 1957 film Berlin, Schoenhauser Corner and as Lutz Weber in Tatort. For several years Schwill was an informant for the Stasi. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |+Film ! Year ! Title !
